description: Students apply psychological facts and principles to the problems that permeate business and industry. Topics include organizational structure, personnel management, employee-supervisor relationships, job satisfaction and motivation, communication and leadership. Offered annually. Counts toward management studies concentration. Prerequisite: PSYCH 125.
name: Indust/Org Psychology

revisions.desc: Students apply psychological facts and principles to the problems that permeate business and industry. Topics include organizational structure, personnel management, employee-supervisor relationships, job satisfaction and motivation, communication and leadership. Offered annually. title: Industrial/Organizational Psychology
